properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 5:21AM CST until January 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Northern Marshall County in northwestern Mississippi...
Northwestern Benton County in northeastern Mississippi...

* Until 600 AM CST.

* At 521 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Red Banks, or
8 miles northwest of Holly Springs, moving east at 40 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Holly Springs, Lamar, Byhalia, Mt Pleasant, Red Banks, Slayden,
Coal Oil Corner, Cayce, Victoria, Hudsonville, Higdon, Watson,
Early Grove, Taska, Atway, Mack and Mahon.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CST for northwestern
Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1000 AM CST
for northeastern Mississippi.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to
flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
